com.constantcontact.exceptions

Class ConstantContactException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • com.constantcontact.exceptions.ConstantContactException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConstantContactComponentException, ConstantContactServiceException

    public class ConstantContactException
extends java.lang.Exception
    Base class for custom exceptions in ConstantContact.
    Each layer will extend this to add needed extras.
    It stores the regular stuff from Exception and a customized list of CUrlRequestError which is populated only when needed.
    Author:
    ConstantContact
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
